name: kinesis
effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
